    boolean[] found = {false};

    class Solver {

                    // ä¸è¦æ’¤é”€é€‰æ‹©ï¼Œå¦åˆ™å€¼ä¼šè¢«é‡ç½®
                    return;

            // åˆ¤æ–­è¡Œæ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨é‡å¤
            for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++) {

public static void solveSudoku(BoardHandler boardHandler) {
    // æ ‡è®°æ˜¯å¦å·²ç»æ‰¾åˆ°å¯è¡Œè§£
    boolean[] found = {false};

    class Solver {
        void backtrack(int index) {
            if (found[0]) {
                // å·²ç»æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªå¯è¡Œè§£ï¼Œç«‹å³ç»“æŸ
                return;
            }

            int m = 9, n = 9;
            int i = index / n, j = index % n;
            if (index == m * n) {

                found[0] = true;
                return;
            }

            if (boardHandler.get(i, j) != null && !boardHandler.isEditable(i, j)) {
                // å¦‚æœæœ‰é¢„è®¾æ•°å­—ï¼Œä¸ç”¨æˆ‘ä»¬ç©·ä¸¾
                backtrack(index + 1);
                return;
            }

            for (int c = 1; c <= 9; c++) {
                // å‰ªæï¼šå¦‚æœé‡åˆ°ä¸åˆæ³•çš„æ•°å­—ï¼Œå°±è·³è¿‡
                if (!isValid(i, j, c)) {
                    continue;
                }

                // åšé€‰æ‹©
                boardHandler.set(i, j, c);

                backtrack(index + 1);
                if (found[0]) {
                    // å¦‚æœæ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªå¯è¡Œè§£ï¼Œç«‹å³ç»“æŸ
                    // ä¸è¦æ’¤é”€é€‰æ‹©ï¼Œå¦åˆ™å€¼ä¼šè¢«é‡ç½®
                    return;
                }

                // æ’¤é”€é€‰æ‹©
                boardHandler.set(i, j, null);
            }
        }

        boolean isValid(int r, int c, int num) {
            // åˆ¤æ–­è¡Œæ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨é‡å¤
            for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++) {
                if (Objects.equals(boardHandler.get(r, i), num)) return false;
            }
            
            // åˆ¤æ–­åˆ—æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨é‡å¤
            for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++) {
                if (Objects.equals(boardHandler.get(i, c), num)) return false;
            }
            
            // åˆ¤æ–­ 3 x 3 æ–¹æ¡†æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨é‡å¤
            int boxRow = (r / 3) * 3;
            int boxCol = (c / 3) * 3;
            for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
                for (int j = 0; j < 3; j++) {
                    if (Objects.equals(boardHandler.get(boxRow + i, boxCol + j), num)) {
                        return false;
                    }
                }
            }
            
            return true;
        }
    }

    new Solver().backtrack(0);
}
